name: Argentavis
description: Large, strong flyer capable of carrying heavy loads and medium creatures.

name: Daeodon
description: Aggressive scavenger that gains health and speed when consuming corpses.

name: Giganotosaurus
description: Massive carnivore with colossal damage and reach; among the strongest land predators.

name: Mantis
description: Giant insect with grappling claws, toxic ranged spit, and mounted weapon capability.

name: Mosasaurus
description: Giant marine predator with crushing jaws—dominates underwater combat.

name: Managarmr
description: Frost-breathing, agile beast capable of powerful leaps and glides.

name: Otter
description: Cute aquatic creature that forages underwater and can produce a special resource.

name: Ovis
description: Docile sheep-like creature useful for wool gathering and festive events.

name: Purlovia
description: Burrowing scorpion-like predator that ambushes prey from below.

name: Quetzalcoatlus
description: The largest flying creature; prized as a mobile air-base and massive transporter when tamed.

name: Raptor
description: Fast and agile pack hunter; excels at hit-and-run attacks.

name: Rex
description: The classic apex predator—enormous health, raw melee power, and a fearsome presence in combat.

name: Rock Drake
description: Stealthy flyer that can cling to walls and glide—ideal for infiltration and mobility.

name: Rock Elemental
description: A golem disguised as a boulder; harvests stone and throws it—valuable for siege tactics.

name: Snow Owl
description: A nocturnal predator that can reduce target’s torpor and has a freezing breath.

name: Therizinosaur
description: Versatile bipedal beast capable of harvesting resources and dealing damage with scythes.

name: Thylacoleo
description: Ambush predator with strong pounce and grappling ability; excels in quick strikes.

name: Triceratops
description: Heavy-horned herbivore with powerful charge attacks and great stamina.

name: Troodon
description: Small, pack-hunting raptor with high intelligence and torpor-based attacks.

name: Unicorn
description: A horse-like, magical creature capable of granting spectral or healing effects to riders.

name: Gacha
description: Crystal-producing creature that can generate random resources.

name: Deinonychus
description: Feathered raptor that is aggressive and fast; excels at coordinated attacks.

name: Megatherium
description: Large bear-like omnivore that becomes exceptionally powerful against insects; valued for chitin farming and combat versatility.

name: Rhyniognatha
description: A massive insect, one of the largest arthropods on the island. Known for its ability to produce resin, carry heavy loads, and offer versatile utility in combat and transport. Highly valued as a powerful support tame.

name: Hyaenodon
description: Pack-based predator that gains strength in numbers.

name: Amargasaurus
description: Spiked sauropod with unique thermal regulation abilities.

name: Dakosaurus
description: Marine predator resembling a crocodile; swift underwater hunter.

name: Shadowmane
description: A powerful chimeric predator from Genesis Part 2. Known for its pack bonuses, teleport pounce, and natural camouflage.

name: Thorny Dragon
description: A spiny desert creature from Scorched Earth. Useful as a wood harvester and capable of firing spine projectiles for defense.

name: Magmasaur
description: A massive volcanic creature from Genesis. It thrives in extreme heat, can smelt metal in its inventory, and unleashes devastating magma projectiles for both offense and defense.

name: Maewing
description: A hybrid creature from Genesis Part 2. Known for its ability to glide long distances, nurse and feed baby creatures, and quickly traverse across diverse terrains with ease.

name: Bloodstalker
description: A terrifying arachnid-like creature from Genesis. It uses webbing to grapple and swing across terrain, latch onto prey, and drain blood to sustain itself.

name: MEK
description: A massive combat mech designed for war. Highly customizable with modules for ranged or melee combat, it excels in both defense and offense against the toughest threats (Max level is 35).

name: MEK with Deployable Shield Module
description: A heavily armored MEK equipped with the Deployable Shield Module. It not only delivers strong offensive power but can also deploy an energy shield to protect allies and structures in combat (Max level is 35).

name: MEK with Rocket Launcher Module
description: A MEK fitted with the Rocket Launcher Module, giving it devastating ranged firepower. It excels at targeting enemies and structures with homing rockets for maximum destruction (Max level is 35).

name: MEK with Siege Cannon Module
description: A MEK armed with the Siege Cannon Module. Designed for heavy warfare, it fires explosive shells that demolish fortifications and deal massive damage to large creatures (Max level is 35).
